fact.description: Today's referee, Nicola Rizzoli, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Germany.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Throw-in Germany.
Germany's Toni Kroos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Argentina defender.
Argentina's Gonzalo Higuain breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Throw-in for Germany close to the penalty box.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Germany throw-in in Argentina's half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Important block from the Germany defence as Lucas Biglia fires in a strike for Argentina.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Germany throw-in in Argentina's half.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Germany.
Can Germany capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Argentina's half?
Germany have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Argentina needs to be cautious. Germany have an attacking throw-in.
Christoph Kramer is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Argentina in their own half.
Play has been resumed.
Germany to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Christoph Kramer has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Argentina's Gonzalo Higuain misses with an attempt on goal.
Germany have a goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Germany.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Germany have a dangerous throw-in.
Germany's Thomas Muller is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Argentina.
Bastian Schweinsteiger for Germany has been booked by Nicola Rizzoli and receives a first yellow card.
Argentina's Gonzalo Higuain has run offside.
The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Christoph Kramer, who is down injured.
Play has been resumed at Estadio do Maracana.
Christoph Kramer, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Andre Schurrle is the substitute for Germany.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Germany's Benedikt Howedes has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in Argentina.
Corner awarded to Argentina.
Germany's Andre Schurrle is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Germany.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Germany throw-in in Argentina's half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a throw-in for Argentina, close to Germany's area.
Throw-in for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Argentina to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Germany's half.
Germany to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Argentina in their own half.
Toni Kroos of Germany smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Benedikt Howedes (Germany) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Thomas Muller of Germany is pulled up for offside.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Germany's half.
Throw-in for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Alejandro Sabella (Argentina) is making a first substitution, with Sergio Aguero replacing Ezequiel Lavezzi.
In Rio de Janeiro Argentina's Gonzalo Higuain is caught offside.
Lionel Messi of Argentina gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Germany have a goal kick.
Throw-in Argentina.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gonzalo Higuain for Argentina who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Play has been resumed.
Miroslav Klose (Germany) strikes at Estadio do Maracana but his header is cleared.
Gonzalo Higuain returns to the field for Argentina after picking up a slight injury.
Germany to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Mesut Ozil for Germany gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Germany have a goal kick.
Argentina have been awarded a corner by Nicola Rizzoli.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Germany's half.
Free kick Germany.
Javier Mascherano (Argentina) has received a yellow card from Nicola Rizzoli.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Germany.
Sergio Aguero (Argentina) has received a first yellow card.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Argentina's half?
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.

Free kick Germany.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Germany throw-in in Argentina's half.
Germany are pushing forward but Andre Schurrle's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Throw-in for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Argentina are coming forward and Lionel Messi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Germany a goal kick.
Throw-in Argentina.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Argentina make their second substitution with Rodrigo Sebastian Palacio replacing Gonzalo Higuain.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Germany throw-in in Argentina's half.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball goes out of play for a Argentina goal kick.
Germany's Toni Kroos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Argentina needs to be cautious. Germany have an attacking throw-in.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Fernando Gago is on a sub for Enzo Perez for Argentina.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Germany's half.
Joachim Low is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Mario Gotze replacing Miroslav Klose.
The match at Estadio do Maracana is underway again.
Argentina to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Attention is being given to Argentina’s Lucas Biglia and play has been suspended briefly.
Argentina's Lucas Biglia is back in action after a slight knock.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the second half in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Argentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Germany push forward through Mario Gotze, whose finish on goal is saved.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Germany's half.
The score after normal time is 0-0.
The first extra period is now underway.
Germany's Andre Schurrle gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Mesut Ozil (Germany) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Argentina attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
Throw-in for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Argentina in their own half.
Free kick Germany.
Free kick Germany.
Goal kick for Argentina at Estadio do Maracana.
Rodrigo Sebastian Palacio for Argentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Germany have a goal kick.
Germany to take a throw-in in Argentina territory.
Nicola Rizzoli awards Argentina a goal kick.
Can Germany capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Argentina's half?
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Argentina.
The match is underway again.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bastian Schweinsteiger.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany's Bastian Schweinsteiger looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
The first extra period is over. The score is 0-0.
The second extra period is just kicking-off.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Germany.
Free kick Germany.
Play is underway once more.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bastian Schweinsteiger is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Germany’s Bastian Schweinsteiger is on his feet again at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
That's a fine assist from Andre Schurrle.
Throw-in Argentina.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a Argentina throw-in in Germany's half.
Throw-in for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Argentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro, Lionel Messi (Argentina) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Argentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Per Mertesacker is replacing Mesut Ozil for Germany at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Ball safe as Argentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Argentina.
Argentina's Lionel Messi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Germany have a goal kick.
Nicola Rizzoli signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
It's 1-0 at the end of extra-time.
